history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00104
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A FREE BASIC MEDICINE ASSISTANCE PROGRAM IN ALL GOVERNMENT HEALTH FACILITIES NATIONWIDE AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
SHORT TITLE : Free Basic Medicine Assistance Act
ABSTRACT : Aims to ensure that no sick person shall be deprived of his or her right to medical attention including the provision of essential medicine.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : TAN, ANGELINA "HELEN" D.L. M.D.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
